q1: Do you think this team will qualify for the next World Cup?
a1: I think there's a good chance.
q2: Is this team want to put effort to qualify for next world cup?
a2: Yes, Croatia has a well developed soccer program and will continue to improve
q3: Don't you think that a lot of the good players are getting to old to keep competing?
a3: They have at least one last world cup before they should retire.
q4: How about their chances at the next Euro in two years time?
a4: I think it's unlikely that they'll win.
